search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Service Fusion (service-fusion.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Service Fusion can be found at this URL: [https://www.servicefusion.com/pricing](https://www.servicefusion.com/pricing) .

### Increase productivity and maximize efficiency with all-in-one service management software.

[Get Free Demo](https://www.servicefusion.com/free-service-fusion-demo/)

 ![Image 20: Service Fusion Demo](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/f_auto/servicefusion/3015/interface_img_png_tablet.png)

How it Works?
-------------

![Image 21: Create & Assign Jobs](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/f_auto/servicefusion/1004/create__assign-jobs-img_1.webp)

1\. Create & Assign Jobs
------------------------

Generate work orders in a single click. Drag and drop to schedule and assign to technicians.

![Image 22: Dispatch & Send Reminders](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/f_auto/servicefusion/1004/dispatch__send-reminders-img_1.webp)

2\. Dispatch & Send Reminders
-----------------------------

Let techs view job details, navigate to sites, and capture payments in app. Send reminders to customers on the day of their work order.

![Image 23: Track Status](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/f_auto/servicefusion/1004/track-status-img.webp)

3\. Track Status
----------------

View locations and status for all technicians. Communicate in app and send updates via push notifications. Streamline field service management.

Productivity

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

*   How many users can I have with Service Fusion?
    
    No matter the plan you choose, you’ll have unlimited users. Whether you have one technician and one dispatcher or 20 technicians and a full office, your Service Fusion pricing will be the same.
    
*   Do I have to sign a contract with Service Fusion?
    
    No, Service Fusion offers all plans on a month-to-month basis. However, you will receive a 15% discount if you choose any of our annual pricing options.
    
*   Does Service Fusion have a mobile application?
    
    Yes, Service Fusion has a technician app that enables field workers to receive and manage jobs on smartphones right in the field. Reduce paperwork and the need for office visits.
    
*   Does Service Fusion offer GPS Fleet Tracking capabilities?
    
    Yes, Service Fusion's GPS Fleet Tracking is fully integrated into the Field Service Management software. Never switch between multiple applications again. Track the number of trips, total distance drove, total idle time, GPS location on a map view, driving behaviors, and more. Learn more [here](https://www.servicefusion.com/gps-fleet-tracking/).
    
*   Does Service Fusion work with Quickbooks?
    
    Yes, Service Fusion integrates with both Quickbooks Online and Desktop versions. As a QuickBooks Solutions Provider, Service Fusion can save you money on QuickBooks.
    
*   Does Service Fusion offer payment processing?
    
    FusionPay powered by PaySimple allows for simplified and expedited payments, on the web and in the field, with the convenience and security your customers expect. Learn more [here](https://www.servicefusion.com/fusionpay-payment-processing/).
    
*   Does Service Fusion offer a VoIP or call tracking solution?
    
    Yes, ServiceCall.ai® was built specifically for service contractors and combines the power of VoIP, artificial intelligence, and field service experience. Learn more [here](https://www.servicefusion.com/servicecall-call-tracker).

### All plans come with no contract requirements, personalized onboarding, and unlimited support through email, phone, or live chat.

Trusted by Over 7,000 Service Companies
---------------------------------------

![Image 39](https://www.servicefusion.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Screen-Shot-2022-10-03-at-8.19.25-PM.png)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

### How many users can I have with Service Fusion?

* * *

No matter the plan you choose, you’ll have unlimited users. Whether you have one technician and one dispatcher or 20 technicians and a full office, your Service Fusion pricing will be the same.

### Do I have to sign a contract with Service Fusion?

* * *

No, Service Fusion offers all plans on a month-to-month basis. However, you will receive a 15% discount if you choose any of our annual pricing options.

### Does Service Fusion have a mobile application?

* * *

Yes, Service Fusion has a technician app that enables field workers to receive and manage jobs on smartphones right in the field. Reduce paperwork and the need for office visits.

### Do I need any other software to use Service Fusion?

* * *

No, Service Fusion is an all-in-one solution. However, we partner with a number of companies to offer integrations to further enhance your field service management software. See our partners and integrations [here](https://www.servicefusion.com/partners-and-integrations).

### Does Service Fusion offer GPS Fleet Tracking capabilities?

* * *

Yes, Service Fusion's GPS Fleet Tracking is fully integrated into the Field Service Management software. Never switch between multiple applications again. Track the number of trips, total distance drove, total idle time, GPS location on a map view, driving behaviors, and more. Learn more [here](https://www.servicefusion.com/gps-fleet-tracking/).

### Does Service Fusion work with Quickbooks?

* * *

Yes, Service Fusion integrates with both Quickbooks Online and Desktop versions. As a QuickBooks Solutions Provider, Service Fusion can save you money on QuickBooks.

### Does Service Fusion offer payment processing?

* * *

FusionPay powered by PaySimple allows for simplified and expedited payments, on the web and in the field, with the convenience and security your customers expect. Learn more [here](https://www.servicefusion.com/fusionpay-payment-processing/).

### Does Service Fusion offer a VoIP or call tracking solution?

* * *

Yes, ServiceCall.ai® was built specifically for service contractors and combines the power of VoIP, artificial intelligence, and field service experience. Learn more [here](https://www.servicefusion.com/servicecall-call-tracker).

### How do I contact Service Fusion Support?

* * *

There are several ways to receive help in Service Fusion. Contact the team: Phone: 888 902 0304, ext 2 Support Hours Monday - Thursday, 8:00 AM CST to 6:00 PM CST Friday, 8:00 AM CST to 5:00 PM CST Or: [Visit our knowledge base](https://servicefusion.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) Email us: support@servicefusion.com
